The primary objective implement systematic approach deliver enhance MTM service primary care set . Secondary objective include : determine successful communication prescriber pharmacist within implement service , determine PGx test incorporate primary care prescribers ' daily work flow , determine patient receptive PGx testing , determine satisfied prescribers enhance MTM clinical service confidence conduct , determine enhance MTM optimizes change drug therapy patient .
